original_text: One of the Pharisees asked him to eat with him, and he went into the Pharisee's house and reclined at table.
korean_text: 한 바리새인이 예수께 자기와 함께 잡수시기를 청하니 이에 바리새인의 집에 들어가 앉으셨을 때에

sentences.original_text: One of the Pharisees asked him to eat with him
sentences.korean_translation: 바리새인 중에 한 사람이 그에게 함께 식사하러 청했다

sentences.original_text: and he went into the Pharisee's house
